required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of LY3323795 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Single-Ascending Dose Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of LY3323795 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study is to investigate the safety of LY3323795 and the effects it has on the body. The study drug or placebo (sugar pill) will be given by mouth to healthy participants. The study has three parts. Each participant may only enroll in one part. The study will last 14 to 43 days, depending on the part. Screening must be completed prior to study start.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with One or More Serious Adverse Event(s) (SAEs) Considered by the Investigator to be Related to Study Drug Administration
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Study Completion (up to Day 43)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of LY3323795 in Plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 144 hours after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of LY3323795 in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Area Under the Concentration Time Curve (AUC) of LY3323795 in Plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 144 hours after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Area Under the Concentration Time Curve (AUC) of LY3323795 in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics (PD): Change from Baseline in Plasma Amyloid Beta (Aβ)₁₋₄₀ and Aβ₁₋₄₂
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 144 hours after study drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics (PD): Change from Baseline in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) Amyloid Beta (Aβ)₁₋₄₀ and Aβ₁₋₄₂
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours after study drug administration

arm_group.description: Escalating doses of LY3323795 given orally in up to 2 of 3 periods.
Placebo matching LY3323795 given orally once in 1 of 3 periods.
Escalating doses of LY3323795 given orally.
Itraconazole given orally alone for up to 11 days in Period 2 and in combination with LY3323795 on one day in Period 2.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy males or females of non-childbearing potential at time of screening
- Have a body mass index (BMI) between 18.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/m²) and 32.0 kg/m², inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have participated, within the last 30 days, in a clinical trial involving an investigational product.
- Have a QT corrected for heart rate (QTc) (using Bazett's formula) interval value of greater than 450 millisecond (msec) (males) or greater than 470 msec (females)
